text:
Never felt so fearfully alone!

Dimly lit room, Raskolnikov alone, inner turmoil.  
Raskolnikov: “Why did I poison her life?”  
Raskolnikov: “I will remain alone!”  

---

Dounia enters, concern etched on her face.  
Dounia: “Don’t be angry, brother; just a minute.”  
Dounia: “I know everything. You’re not in danger.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov feels a profound sense of loneliness and guilt for burdening Sonia with his troubles, contemplating isolation as a better alternative.
